name: Gingerbread Man Dress Up Mania Pro - Addictive Fun Maker Games for Kids, Boys and Girls
name_original: Gingerbread Man Dress Up Mania Pro - Addictive Fun Maker Games for Kids, Boys and Girls
description:
Gingerbread Man want to be Dressed up and want to celebrate with you so get ready dressed you Gingerbread Man on this great occasion and let him celebrate with you!!

You have got a huge accessories collection for your Gingerbread Man, Glasses, Hats, Caps, Shirts, Shoes, Santa Caps, Awesome Hairs, Shorts and very much!!

Great Features of game:
1. Easy to play.
2. Great, Awesome and fun sounds.
3.Amazing accessories.
4. Sharing with friends.

Download and Play today, Enjoy!

Please rate & review to get us better and creating Amazing games for you,

Thanks
